stories.title: Police use Israel's NSO to target politicians, businessmen, journalists

stories.text:
I am looking for a standard that describes the precise definition for mathematical symbols and notation.

Is there a widely accepted, precise standard for this like there is standard for the C language?

Obviously, I am no mathematician :-)
stories.title: Ask HN: Where are the “docs” for mathematical notation?

stories.text:
As title, I plan to build a marketplace startup 6 months down the road as an engineer lead. I would like to get a head start on learning about different engineering systems and U.S. regulations in this space. Do you recommend any books or resources on this topic?

A few unknown stuff comes to mind: merchant of record, payment system, modeling your product catalogs, reconciliation etc.
stories.title: Ask HN: Best resources to learn about engineering challenge of a marketplace
Capiche – It's about the software people
The Durability Formula – How It Will Determine Your Startup’s Future Value
A Big Tech Trade Is Losing Its Luster
The Gender Gap in Censorship Support
